snippet: A dentist for three children killed last month in a fire in New Jersey was charged with fraud after giving the police dental records that they say showed a Medicaid scheme.
abstract: Dentist Paresh Patel of South Plainfield, NJ, is charged with fraud after police say dental records that he provided for three children killed in a house fire revealed a Medicaid scheme.
lead_paragraph: A dentist for three children killed last month in a fire in New Jersey was charged with fraud after giving the police dental records that they say showed a Medicaid scheme.

headline.seo: New Jersey Dentist Is Accused of Medicaid Fraud
headline.main: For Dentist, a Fire Leads to Charges
headline.print_headline: For Dentist, a Fire Leads to Charges
